created_at: this is why it is so important to understand suport and resistance lines. In mid November
column3: we could determine a resistance line after a few periods which gave us a target entry of 30.00. This never hit our target and started a downtrend. Last period was one period over the 5 day EMA (green line) in which we now need a confirmation that momentum has swung upwards. We can get that if this trades over the 50 day SMA (red line) around 20.00. It still has to trade over that upper resistance but there's a 10.00 price differential to get between the 50 and resistance. Some other things have to happen but I have an alert set at 20.00. If it reachs that
column4: then I'll look at a possible entry with a 30% upside. Have a great green week
